My Projects

Spark : Smart Parking System

> Designed in order to save the parking space and also to avoid the inconveniencefaced by the non-systematic way of parking the vehicles.

> Currently in the semifinal round in DST & Texas Instruments India Innovation Challenge Design Contest 2018, Anchored by IIM, Bangalore.

> Participated and Qualified till the zonal level in Manthan InnovationChallenge, conducted by FKCCI, State government of Karnataka.
